brief: Evaluates the Bezier at point t for points a, b, c, d.
name: bezierPoint()
description:
Evaluates the Bezier at point t for points a, b, c, d. The parameter t
 varies between 0 and 1, a and d are points on the curve, and b and c are
 the control points. This can be done once with the x coordinates and a
 second time with the y coordinates to get the location of a bezier curve
 at t.

parameters.name: graphics
parameters.description: any object of the type PGraphics

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: coordinate of first point on the curve

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: coordinate of second point on the curve
